attributes.description:
At WINGFIELD MOTORS our customer is king!
Before delivery, this vehicle will receive a Multi-point quality inspection before being subjected to an AA DEKRA roadworthiness test.  We will trade in any vehicle on this transaction and ensure you receive a pleasant buying experience.  Finance and Insurance can be arranged from our premises by our highly qualified and experienced staff.  You can be assured of great aftersales service, should this be required.  This vehicle can be delivered country wide at an agreed cost.  Please ask about our optional Mechanical breakdown warranties for your new vehicle.  We also provide optional Service Plans to ensure you do not experience sudden servicing costs.

attributes.title: 2022 Renault Kwid 1.0 Dynamique

attributes.description:
All the flair of the KONA has been recaptured in the N-inspired KONA N Line. Like you, it moves with a different energy, featuring advanced technology and inspired aerodynamics. The N-inspired interior comes complete in leather, featuring a red and black trim as well as the iconic N-Badge on the seats and gear-knob. It’s an everyday sports car that will be right at home in your driveway.
Bring your unique touch of magic to the world every time tyre meets road in the new KONA. What you see is only a hint of what you get & what you get is plenty with a range of ingenious innovations in an SUV that isn’t afraid to be itself, stylish & driven.
Play your life’s theme songs at the touch of a button with Android Auto & Apple CarPlay. Sit comfortably behind the wheel of the KONA on artificial leather seat trims & take every trip to the next level with rear parking sensors & camera, daytime running lights & HAC (Hill Start Assist Control).
Nobody does you better than you and no SUV embraces individuality, style & colour quite like the new KONA. Set your own trend with a range of vibrant finishes and colours to choose from including Surfy Blue, Pulse Red, Atlas White, Ignite Flame, Cyber Grey and Dark Knight.

Nationwide delivery. All Trade-in's welcome. Finance can be arranged, Contact us today! Price excludes on the road fees.

attributes.description:
Explore the less-travelled roads in space-age comfort and style.
Cruise powerfully along mountain passes, tropical coasts and winding rivers.
Discover what's around the next corner, and the next, and the next.
Find exciting new stories in unexpected places.
Do it all with smooth, assured AWD power and unrivalled safety technology.
Go the way you want, in the all-new Kia Sorento. 
Step away from the everyday and admire the design of the Kia
Sorento. With its distinctive new contours and wheel arch cladding,
body colour door handles with a touch of satin chrome, sleek trim,
and side sills, and distinctive daylight opening graphic, this car
perfectly combines on-road sophistication with off-road thrills while
at the same time producing lower emissions.


 


Nationwide delivery. All Trade-in's welcome. Finance can be arranged, Contact us today! Price excludes on the road fees.
